ordersText.title: FAITHFUL ADVANCE
ordersText.general: While resolving this order, you may move up to 2 of your units trough uncontrolled world as if it were a friendly area. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: DIVINE DELIVERANCE
ordersText.general: When you start combat with this order, gain 1 [D] for each unrouted Sister Repentia in the reinforcement step. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: LEAD THE RIGHTEOUS
ordersText.general: After you resolve this this order you may rally all of your units in the active system or in an adjacent system. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: WAR HYMNS
ordersText.general: If the combined morale value of all of your ships participating in the orbital strike is higher than combined morale value of all unrouted units and structures on the enemy world, force your opponent to rout 1 unit. Then you may spend 1 [S] to force your opponent to retreat that unit. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: BRAZIER OF HOLY FIRE
ordersText.general: Bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. During this orbital strike, you may rout any number of participating ships. For each ship routed, convert 2 dice into [B]. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: UNDIVIDED FAITH
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* At the begining of the last execution round of combat, you may discard this card to add half of routed units' morale value, rounded up, at the resolution step of the combat.

eventsText.title: HEROINE IN THE MAKING
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Instead of revealing an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to resolve an Advance Order which must start a combat using 1 Sister Repentia or 1 Battle Sister. This combat lasts 1 execution round. Treat your chosen unit as Living Saint. Destroy this unit after resolution step of the combat.

eventsText.title: INDOMITABLE BELIEF
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* At the begining of an execution round of combat, you may discard this card. If you do, your units cannot become routed during this execution round.

eventsText.title: FAIT ACCOMPLI
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* Instead of revealing an order during the Operations Phase, you may discard this card to take 1 Sister Repentia or 1 Battle Sister from any world and place it on a friendly world.

eventsText.title: INVASION CATHEDRUM DEPLOYMENT
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free Battle Sister on a friendly world containing at least 1 friendly unit or place 1 free Sister Repentia on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: CRUSADE INTO DARKNESS
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 combat upgrade, reducing its materiel cost by up to 3 for each system containing both your and opponent's units.

eventsText.title: INSPIRING ORATOR
eventsText.general: Gain 1 reinforcement token for each friendly world containing a city.

eventsText.title: ULTIMATE DEVOTION
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free city on a friendly world not containing a structure or spend 3 materiel to place 1 free city on a friendly world not containing a city.

combatText.title: DRIVEN ONWARDS
combatText.general: Force your opponent to reroll 2 dice of his choice.
combatText.unit: Bastion/Sister Repentia/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 (S) for each [B] rolled by your opponent while resolving the general ability of this card.

combatText.title: BEACON OF FAITH
combatText.unit: Sister Repentia: Replace 1 of your Sisters Repentia on this world with 1 free Battle Sister and gain 2 [D]. *newline* - or - *newline* Bastion/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 [M] and 2 (S).

combatText.title: GUIDED RETRIBUTION
combatText.unit: Bastion/Sister Repentia/Light Cruisers: Gain 1 (B) or 1 (S). *newpara* Play 1 combat card from your hand. Then discard this card.

combatText.title: HOLY TRINITY
combatText.general: If this card gets discarded gain 2 (B). *newpara* Gain 2 [B].
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Bastion: Gain 2 (B). During the assess damage step of this execution round, force your opponent to assign damage to his units 1 at a time.

combatText.title: SANCTIFIED  CHARGE
combatText.general: Gain 2 [D]. *newpara* Reroll 1 die of your choice.
combatText.unit: Sister Repentia/Light Cruiser: Gain 1 (B) for every [B], 1 (S) for every [S] and 1 [D] for every [M] rolled while resolving the general ability of this card.

combatText.title: ZEALOTS PASSION
combatText.general: Force your opponent to lose 1 [M]. *newpara* Gain 1 (B) or discard 1 card from your hand.
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: If you are attacking, your opponent cannot place reinforcement tokens in this area or rally units this execution round. *newline* If you are defending, rally 1 of your units.

combatText.title: MARTYRDOM
combatText.general: Convert up to 2 of your [B] into [M].
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Choose 1 of your unrouted units. That unit suffers damage first during this execution round. Damage in excess of the chosen unit health value is lost.

combatText.title: SPIRITUAL FORTITUDE
combatText.general: If you are defending, force your opponent to lose 2 (B). *newpara* Force your oppononent to lose either 1 [B] or 1 [M].

combatText.title: ANGELIC DESCENT
combatText.general: Gain 1 (S) for each of your unrouted units, up to 3.
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: After the assess damage step of combat your opponent chooses and destroys 1 of his routed units unless he spends 1 [B].

combatText.title: MARTYR'S IMMOLATION
combatText.general: Gain 3 (S) unless your opponent spends 1 die of his choice. If he does, gain 1 [M] instead.
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Spend 1 [S] to gain 2 (B). *newline* - or - *newline* Exorcist/Grand Cruiser: Gain 3 (B). Choose 1 command level 2 unit to suffer damage first during this execution round. If the chosen unit is destroyed gain 2 (B) at the start of the next execution round.

combatText.title: ARMOURED IN FAITH
combatText.unit: Battle Sister/Light Cruiser: Rally 1 of your units. *newline* - or - *newline* Exorcist/Grand Cruiser: If you have more [M] than your opponent, your opponent chooses and routs 1 of his units.

combatText.title: DEVASTATING REFRAIN
combatText.general: If this card gets discarded you may resolve its ability. *newpara* Spend up to 3 of your dice. For each die you spend, gain either 1 [B] or 1 [S]. Gain 1 (B) for each [M] spent.

combatText.title: DIVINE BLESSING
combatText.general: Spend any number of [S] and [M]. For each die you spent, force your opponent to lose 1 [B].

combatText.title: DIVINE SMITING
combatText.general: Your opponent chooses and discards 1 of his faceup combat cards.
combatText.unit: Living Saint/Grand Cruiser: Play the top card of your combat deck. Do not resolve its abilities, but gain its combat icons during this combat.
